channelDescription:
what a journey it is to understanding how to feel our best, so hey, lets do it together ♡ sharing my life as a 23 year-old living in London & my at-home workouts with you as a certified Pilates instructor (L3 pilates mat instructor) 
hope you stick around 🤍
ly all millions

comments: This was the perfect way to reset and calm down before a job interview🧘‍♀️💪 thank you lidia!🩷

Lidia! I have been doing your workouts several times a week for about a month now and my co worker just told me I have better posture than before! I also notice changes in my muscles and that I am more toned and also well, I enjoy your workouts which is the most important :D
your best pilates for me so far. omg I love this

Lidia, I LOVE your workouts so so much. They make me feel so strong and confident. I also enjoy all your recipes and wieiad videos on shorts. I am so glad you exist bc a smile appears on my face whenever you upload a new video! You are so importang to me, I hope you know that! I wish you all the best and hope that your chanel will grow bigger and bigger❤
I usually hate pilates but today i did two of you pilates workout one 30min and this 20min and i loved it! I had so much fun! Thank you
